registry.title: Performance Metrics Registry
registry.note: Summary category shown. Complete registry entries available in the URIs of each row.

record.name: RTDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic_RFC8912sec4_Seconds_95Percentile
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (which are the two measurement points). The output is the round-trip delay for all successfully exchanged packets expressed as the 95th percentile of their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: RTLoss_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic_RFC8912sec4_Percent_LossRatio
record.description: This metric assesses the loss ratio of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (which are the two measurement points). The output is the round-trip loss ratio for all successfully exchanged packets expressed as a percentage.

record.name: OWPDV_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic_RFC8912sec5_Seconds_95Percentile
record.description: This metric assesses packet delay variation with respect to the minimum delay observed on the periodic stream. The output is expressed as the 95th percentile of the packet delay variation distribution.

record.name: RTDNS_Active_IP-UDP-Poisson_RFC8912sec6_Seconds_Raw
record.description: This is a metric for DNS Response performance from a network user's perspective, for a specific named resource. The metric can be measured repeatedly using different resource names. This metric assesses the response time, the interval from the query transmission to the response.

record.name: RLDNS_Active_IP-UDP-Poisson_RFC8912sec6_Logical_Raw
record.description: This is a metric for DNS Response performance from a network user's perspective, for a specific named resource. The metric can be measured repeatedly using different resource names. This metric indicates that the response was deemed lost. In other words, the response time exceeded the maximum waiting time.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Poisson-Payload250B_RFC8912sec7_Seconds_95Percentile
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the 95Percentile of one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Poisson-Payload250B_RFC8912sec7_Seconds_Mean
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the Mean of one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Poisson-Payload250B_RFC8912sec7_Seconds_Min
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the Min of one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Poisson-Payload250B_RFC8912sec7_Seconds_Max
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the Max of one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Poisson-Payload250B_RFC8912sec7_Seconds_StdDev
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the StdDev of one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWLoss_Active_IP-UDP-Poisson-Payload250B_RFC8912sec7_Percent_LossRatio
record.description: This metric assesses the loss ratio of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (which are the two measurement points). The output is the one-way loss ratio for all transmitted packets expressed as a percentage.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic20m-Payload142B_RFC8912sec8_Seconds_95Percentile
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the 95Percentile one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic20m-Payload142B_RFC8912sec8_Seconds_Mean
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the Mean one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic20m-Payload142B_RFC8912sec8_Seconds_Min
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the Min one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic20m-Payload142B_RFC8912sec8_Seconds_Max
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the Max one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWDelay_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic20m-Payload142B_RFC8912sec8_Seconds_StdDev
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (or measurement points) and reports the StdDev one-way delay for all successfully exchanged packets based on their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: OWLoss_Active_IP-UDP-Periodic20m-Payload142B_RFC8912sec8_Percent_LossRatio
record.description: This metric assesses the loss ratio of a stream of packets exchanged between two hosts (which are the two measurement points). The output is the one-way loss ratio for all transmitted packets expressed as a percentage.

record.name: RTDelay_Active_IP-ICMP-SendOnRcv_RFC8912sec9_Seconds_Mean
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of ICMP packets exchanged between two hosts (which are the two measurement points). The output is the round-trip delay for all successfully exchanged packets expressed as the Mean of their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: RTDelay_Active_IP-ICMP-SendOnRcv_RFC8912sec9_Seconds_Min
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of ICMP packets exchanged between two hosts (which are the two measurement points). The output is the round-trip delay for all successfully exchanged packets expressed as the Min of their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: RTDelay_Active_IP-ICMP-SendOnRcv_RFC8912sec9_Seconds_Max
record.description: This metric assesses the delay of a stream of ICMP packets exchanged between two hosts (which are the two measurement points). The output is the round-trip delay for all successfully exchanged packets expressed as the Max of their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: RTLoss_Active_IP-ICMP-SendOnRcv_RFC8912sec9_Percent_LossRatio
record.description: This metric assesses the loss ratio of a stream of ICMP packets exchanged between two hosts (which are the two measurement points). The output is the round-trip loss ratio for all transmitted packets expressed as a percentage.

record.name: RTDelay_Passive_IP-TCP_RFC8912sec10_Seconds_Mean
record.description: This metric assesses the round-trip delay of TCP packets constituting a single connection, exchanged between two hosts. We consider the measurement of round-trip delay based on a single Observation Point (OP) [RFC7011] somewhere in the network. The output is the round-trip delay for all successfully exchanged packets expressed as the Mean of their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: RTDelay_Passive_IP-TCP_RFC8912sec10_Seconds_Min
record.description: This metric assesses the round-trip delay of TCP packets constituting a single connection, exchanged between two hosts. We consider the measurement of round-trip delay based on a single Observation Point (OP) [RFC7011] somewhere in the network. The output is the round-trip delay for all successfully exchanged packets expressed as the Min of their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: RTDelay_Passive_IP-TCP_RFC8912sec10_Seconds_Max
record.description: This metric assesses the round-trip delay of TCP packets constituting a single connection, exchanged between two hosts. We consider the measurement of round-trip delay based on a single Observation Point (OP) [RFC7011] somewhere in the network. The output is the round-trip delay for all successfully exchanged packets expressed as the Max of their conditional delay distribution.

record.name: RTDelay_Passive_IP-TCP-HS_RFC8912sec10_Seconds_Singleton
record.description: RTDelay Singleton: This metric assesses the round-trip delay of TCP packets initiating a single connection (or 3-way handshake), exchanged between two hosts. We consider the measurement of round-trip delay based on a single Observation Point (OP) [RFC7011] somewhere in the network. The output is a single measurement of Round-trip delay, or Singleton.

record.name: RTLoss_Passive_IP-TCP_RFC8912sec10_Packet_Count
record.description: This metric assesses the estimated loss count for TCP packets constituting a single connection, exchanged between two hosts. We consider the measurement of round-trip delay based on a single Observation Point (OP) [RFC7011] somewhere in the network. The output is the estimated loss count for the measurement interval.

registry.title: Performance Metric Name Elements - Metric Type

record.name: Active
record.description: depends on a dedicated measurement packet stream and observations of the stream as described in [RFC7799]

record.name: Passive
record.description: depends *solely* on observation of one or more existing packet streams as described in [RFC7799]

record.name: Hybrid Type 1
record.description: Hybrid Type I obervations on one stream that combine both Active Methods and Passive Methods as described in [RFC7799]

record.name: Hybrid Type 2
record.description: Hybrid Type II obervations on two or more streams that combine both Active Methods and Passive Methods as described in [RFC7799]

record.name: DSCPxx
record.description: where xx is replaced by a Diffserv code point

record.name: SendOnRcv
record.description: Sender keeps one packet in transit by sending when previous packet arrives

record.name: PayloadxxxxB
record.description: where xxxx is replaced by an integer, the number of octets or 8-bit Bytes in the Payload

registry.title: Performance Metric Name Elements - Spec
registry.note: Spec contains an immutable document identifier combined with a document section identifier for the specifying document. See Section 7.1.2 of [RFC8911].

record.name: Multiple
record.description: more than one type of unit
